title: Unable to connect to servers.
body: Twice in a row now I've joined a game, made it to champion select, then had the game crash on me when the match proper began, with a message warning me I was unable to connect to the server. Fixing my proxy settings client-side didn't seem to have any effect, and troubleshooting couldn't identify any further problems on my end. I am running a repair as I type this, but what are some other things I would need to look into in case that still doesn't work?

replies.body: It sounds like your network can't establish a connection with your game server, meaning that your issue is more related to a connection problem and not your game files.  As a first step, try the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide which will have instructions to get this fixed.  It would be best to test it out in custom games to prevent Leaverbuster issues.  Let me know if your issue continues and we'll look for more options!
I can't seem to find anything on my end that would be the problem, but still I cannot connect to the server.

Thanks for trying all that!  No worries, reach out to us through a[ ticket submission](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can help out!  I also suggest gathering a set of logs from the [hextech repair tool ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs)to help give some context and attaching it to your ticket.  We'll respond as soon as possible, hang tight!
Done and done. Hopefully I did the hextech zip files right.
I suggest dont que for anymore games, because you're gonna get leaverbuster with the rest of us.
